selected_quotes: If talking to men has put this issue in the media + drawn attention to sex + #endometriosis - that's a good thing! ht…
Why talking to men about their experiences of their partner's endometriosis could be helpful -from a researcher
A nice response to the Endo study by Western Sydney Uni women's health researcher w/ links to research. V thorough
Jane Ussher: it's important to talk to women's partners about impact of endo on sexual wellbeing

citation.abstract: I am not enraged by reports of a study examining the sexual impact of endometriosis on male partners. Talking to both members of a couple about a health issue is important.
citation.title: Sex and women's diseases: it's common and important to include men's perspectives

news.title: Talking about sex and women's diseases
news.summary: Some women suffering from endometriosis, a disease that causes chronic pelvic pain, have criticised a Sydney University student for choosing to conduct research on the sexual impact of the disease on women’s partners.
